level.heading: Conversion of mutual insurance holding company.
level.text: Chapter 9 of this title shall be applicable to the conversion of a mutual insurance holding company formed under this subchapter to a stock company as if the mutual insurance holding company were a mutual insurance company.

level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 31-751.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-112, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 31-751.
